DOC.brief_summary: Low carbohydrate diet may influence the plasma lipid levels.
DOC.brief_title: Low Carbohydrate Diet - Effect on Plasma Lipids and Metabolic Markers
DOC.detailed_description: Fasting plasma lipids will be measured in healthy volunteer randomized to low carbohydrate diet or usual diet for a period
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers Exclusion criteria: Any disease or use of prescriptional medication
